comments.body:
It looks like this could be `noarch: python`:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html#noarch-python

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

comments.body:
Add a comment above the `licence_file` line that includes a link to the following issue:

https://github.com/AlliedToasters/circle-fit/issues/7

as a reminder to look for the license file in the source distribution in future releases so the manually packaged one can be removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  # https://github.com/AlliedToasters/circle-fit/issues/7
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: "Circle Fitting Library in Python"
